name: Soccer bounce - Free
description:
Quickly football game that can make you crazy when your opponent constantly wins. Gather your team and lay out the tactics on the field. Upgrade and make your own star player and dribble the ball towards goal. First to 3 goals wins. Do you have the football mind it takes to win?

Free version, NO pay to win. All features for free, NO accidental "in-app purchases".

For the family on vacation and the kids in the back seat of your car.
